Name: Tsukai Furushita Kotoba Ya Uta Wo MV
About the game: This is a game where you can freely move around in the VR space and enjoy the live performance of the song “Tsukai Furushita Kotoba Ya Uta Wo(Used Words and Songs)”. Start playing by operating the control panel in the VR space. Please enjoy Music Video using the whole space by making full use of particles. 1.Title of work Tsukai Furushita Kotoba Ya Uta Wo 2.Original song introduction Illustration : Komani Lyrics : Oboron Composition & Movie : Masakuni(Shippu-P) 3.Description of the work ---concept--- 「Particle production to convey songs and lyrics」 ---Trigger of production--- 'I want to make a particle live with my favorite Shippu P song!' ---Detailed explanation--- From the original image, the space was based on white and yellow. I would like you to know the lyrics so that you can see them clearly in black and white. The movement has also been simplified. Particle production was personally imaged from songs and lyrics. I tried to keep the music out of the way. The model choreography captured my movements. This work was made with permission from Masakuni (Shippu-P).
